column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was a tourist in Chicago so take my word with a grain of salt
column2: but my friend and I tried both Lou Malnati's and Giordano's
column3: and Lou Malnati's was better! There was less overall cheese (still plenty though) and more sauce
column4: and they made the crust nice and buttery somehow. Service was kind of slow
column5: but I'm guessing it's because they make the pizzas fresh.
